name: TS Demo Importer
author: Themeshopy

sections.description: TS Demo Importer will allow you to add features of customizer and widgets. Which will be visible on front page of site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ts_demo_importer.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
0.1.2

Added new template.

Fixed UI responsive bugs

Initial release.
